org.elasticsearch.action

Class Action<Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request,Response,RequestBuilder,Client>,Client extends ElasticsearchClient>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.GenericAction<Request,Response>
      • org.elasticsearch.action.Action<Request,Response,RequestBuilder,Client>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientAction, ClusterAction, IndicesAction

    public abstract class Action<Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request,Response,RequestBuilder,Client>,Client extends ElasticsearchClient>
extends GenericAction<Request,Response>
    Base action. Supports building the Request through a RequestBuilder.
